projects: [{"title":"Individualistic Opinion Mining (Advanced Natural Language Processing, Masters Thesis Work, Guide - Prof. Parag Singla, Prof. Maya Ramanath)","start_date":"Mar 2019","end_date":"Jul 2020","description":"Predicting individualistic opinion of different people on some given news articles using just 100 labelled articles. FIne tuned Google's BERT to extract features and used transfer learning to train a classifier on top of those extracted features. Used NB-SVM as baseline model. Further working on explainability of the model and predicting things around a given context using sliding window techiniques. Trained a new language model from scratch (Multiplicative LSTM). Used brat as annotation tool for collecting training data."},{"title":"Automatic Scheduler (Artificial Intelligence)","description":"Scheduled different conference talks and audits timings minimizing the clash between different events as far as possible using best first search technique of artificial intelligence."},{"title":"Cloud Computing ( Module design for live migration using a migration plan and virsh commands)","description":"Proposed a migration plan that takes into account 3 parameters namely network traffic, memory usage and CPU usage. Based on the above proposed migration plan, Live migrated Virtual machines to a different server, thereby showing the load balancing. The whole thing was done on IIT Delhi own cloud setup, BAADAL."},{"title":"DCG Handler and Parser (Prolog NLP Techniques)","description":"Formulated DCG grammar to generate parse trees, output logical forms of sentences & answer queries based on them."},{"title":"Game of Yinsh Bot (AI techniques)","description":"Used adversarial search algorithm to build an optimally playing bot for the game of Yinsh"},{"title":"Latex To Html Converter","description":"Parsed the entire latex document and converted it into an equivalent html document using FLEX & BISON parser"},{"title":"Parallelization of Deterministic Algorithm (Edit Distance)","description":"Parallelized the edit distance problem using 3 languages, namely OpenMP, MPI and CUDA. Ran and showed scalability on a 40 core cpu cluster. Further analyzed the performance on different operating systems."},{"title":"Paratroopers Game (Unity 3D)","description":"Developed & revamped the game of paratroopers using UNITY 3D framework, Language used - C#"},{"title":"SAT solver (Modelled a problem as SAT problem)","description":"Formulated the discovery of drug agencies problem as a CNF SAT formula and then solved it using a given SATsolver (miniSAT)"},{"title":"Sentiment Analysis (Machine Learning)","description":"Predicting generalised opinion of people on new articles using RNTN, Recursive Neural Tensor Network."},{"title":"The Game of Blackjack (Markov Decision Process)","description":"Modelled the optimal game play of black jack using ideas from sequential decision making under uncertainity(Markov Decision Processes)"},{"title":"Web Scrapping (Using Mozilla Firefox)","description":"Modified mozilla source repository to filter significant information while visiting any news website"}]
